name: Black and Decker  HH2455  Electric  Lawn Tools  Hedge Trimmer  ;Orange / Black

reviews.name: Black and Decker Hedgehog 24" Electric Trimmer with Rotating Handle
reviews.reviewText: For being a Black and Decker I'm more than a little disappointed with this trimmer. It is supposed to cut up to 3/4 inch branches. It will cut twigs and small 1/4 inch branches fine, but anything bigger than that is a stretch. It chews on the branch until it finally cuts through, but the cut isn't clean or quick. It was easier and quicker to get the manual cutters out. Kind of defeats the purpose of buying a power trimmer. The ragged cut can't be good on the hedge. When done it looked like a herd of beavers came through and trimmed my hedge.
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.name: Black and Decker Hedgehog 24" Electric Trimmer with Rotating Handle
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how powerful this trimmer is. I trimmed a set of three overgrown bushes in about 10 minutes. Whenever it takes longer to set up and clean up than to do the job, I know I have a good tool, which was the case with this one.
reviews.title: Good Product

reviews.name: Black and Decker Hedgehog 24" Electric Trimmer with Rotating Handle
reviews.reviewText: Great for trimming smaller hedges...easy to use.
reviews.title: 06 August 2013

reviews.name: Black and Decker Hedgehog 24" Electric Trimmer with Rotating Handle
reviews.reviewText: Although I haven't had the opportunity to use it yet the previous Black and Decker trimmer I had worked excellent for years. This one is a bit heavier but I'm confident it will perform as advertised.
reviews.title: 03 September 2013
